# additionalContactKeyDescriptors

**Instance Property**

An array of contact property keys or key descriptors from contact objects to fetch in the returned contacts.

## Declaration

```swift
var additionalContactKeyDescriptors: [any CNKeyDescriptor]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, the system only fetches [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactIdentifierKey] if you do not include a list of additional key descriptors. The system always fetches [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactIdentifierKey], whether you request it or not.

For a list of possible keys, see [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/contact-keys].

## Configuring the fetch request

- **excludedTransactionAuthors**: An array of strings that identify transaction authors to exclude from the fetch results.
- **includeGroupChanges**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the fetch should also return group changes.
- **mutableObjects**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the fetch should return mutable contacts and groups.
- **shouldUnifyResults**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the fetch should return contact changes as unified contacts.
- **startingToken**: An opaque token that indicates a point in history in the user’s Contacts database.
